<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Deactivate Ui Actions For Rotation</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[/** * Business rules on v_rotation table of 'when' type 'action_list_button', get converted to UI action on upgrade via a fix script. These needs to be deactivated. * Set the active flag (to false) on UI actions which got converted from Business rules * UI actions (previously Business rules) which are de-activated are: - Edit Schedule - Refresh Report - Roster Properties */
deactivateUiActionsForRotation();
function deactivateUiActionsForRotation() { var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_ui_action"); gr.addQuery("table", "=", "v_rotation"); gr.addQuery("name", "IN", "Edit Schedule,Refresh Report,Roster Properties"); gr.query(); while (gr.next()) { gr.setValue("active", false); gr.update(); } } ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-08-27 10:46:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>72574cbb6784230099e0775617415a04</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Deactivate Ui Actions For Rotation</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="On-Call Scheduling" source="com.snc.on_call_rotation">4bca78ec3cf1311068bcf327dfe37f86</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_72574cbb6784230099e0775617415a04</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-08-27 10:46:14</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
